# Octopus Leg Clone Technique

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Ninjutsu, Clone Techniques
- Class: Supplementary
- Users: Killer B
- Media: Anime, Manga, Novel, Game

## Summary
By using a small portion of GyÅ«ki's chakra and sacrificing one of its tentacles, Killer B can create a flawless clone of himself that neither the Sharingan, nor the Akatsuki, could distinguish. This clone is apparently long-lasting and can sustain considerable damage, only reverting back into the tentacle when completely drained of chakra.
